main.name: Nomaan Ahmed
main.description: I'm a Software Engineer with a proven history of being able to design, develop, and deliver well-built products.
main.bio: I like to solve problems and build things. Lately, I've been trying to do both of those at scale. Always looking to make an impact - have something in mind? Let's talk.
main.contactmessage: Have something in mind? Let's talk.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: Graduated from the Gina Cody School of Engineering & Computer Science at Concordia University with a Bachelor’s of Engineering in Software Engineering. Focus on Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence and Big Data.

work.tagline: Global startup specializing in all aspects of ecommerce enabling major brands to expand worldwide. Brands include Urban Outfitters, American Eagle, Crate & Barrel & others.
work.title: Engineering Manager

work.tagline: Multinational financial services corporation responsible for the largest payment processing network in the world specializing in cashless payments.
work.title: Software Engineering Manager
description: Promotion due to performance, already fulfilling role responsibilities, and ability to communicate effectively across technical and non-technical parties.
Managed team of 10+ developers located in 4 countries across 3 time zones by interviewing, hiring/terminating, managing budget, and respecting promised deliverable schedule.
Translated stakeholder needs into software architecture and design of 2 new web applications used in B2B financial services involving Fortune 500 companies.
Designed, developed, and delivered 2 new Single-Page Web  Apps, while leading 2 existing ones.

Accomplished the above by improving software engineering process using several methods, including sprint planning, proper use of JIRA, sprint retrospectives, testing pipeline, git management, and others.

work.title: Software Engineer - Full Stack
description: Developed and assisted in design & architecture of 2 Single-Page Web Applications using ReactJS, NodeJS, Python & PostgreSQL as part of a team. Version control using Git.
Implemented proprietary algorithms for scoring users based on data analysis of over 1000 points of financial data & machine learning.
Suggested and integrated best practices including code quality, coverage, and unit testing, among others.

work.tagline: Largest independent video game publisher worldwide with multi-billion dollar revenue from major IPs and AAA video game franchises such as Assassin's Creed & Tom Clancy.
work.title: Tools Programmer
description: Received offer to transfer teams at request of new team lead & favorable recommendation of previous team lead. Accepted due to personal interest in Web Development.
Development using Angular (TypeScript) with MongoDB. Version control using Git.
Implemented tools to track and evaluate users’ interactions while using the application to identify problem areas in coordination with UX department.
Created a tool to automatically generate documentation for developers' code in Markdown while also enforcing test-driven development.
Heavy use of Scrum/Agile.

work.title: Tools Programmer
description: Developed, maintained, and optimized real-time collaborative tools used in production of AAA titles pre-release and post-release.
Requiring high proficiency in WPF (.NET/C#) & WinForms. Version control using Perforce/Helix.
Coordinated with UX team to ensure stakeholder needs are being met.
Heavy use of Scrum/Agile with strict deadlines and tight workflows.
Worked with highly confidential information as titles were unannounced.

work.tagline: Multi-billion dollar world leader in design and production of cast and forged severe service valves and steam traps across major industrial applications.
work.title: Engineering Draft Technician
description: Analysis and reporting of chemical processing procedures and reviewing & drafting of technical drawings for manufacturing of industrial valves.
Responsible for updating and maintaining an inventory and shipment management database requiring annual overhaul.
Automated many daily tasks using scripts to increase efficiency.
Trained and supervised others to perform the above tasks.

web.name: JavaScript
web.details: React, React Native, Express.js, Node.js, Angular

oop.name: Python
oop.details: Anaconda, TensorFlow, Pandas, Big Data, ML, AI

testimonials.text: Nomaan was an absolute professional and a pleasure to work with. I've never seen someone so able to discuss complex and technical ideas, but also simplify them when necessary. He reminds me of myself.
